backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor implementing access control, user profiles, package management, subscribers, and billing data structures with admin-protected mutations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs for traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file for documentation or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles defining OKLCH colors, theme variables, and RTL-friendly base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring Arabic language, RTL direction, and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling authentication flow, profile setup, and navigation between dashboard, subscribers, and billing pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Login gate UI prompting unauthenticated users to sign in via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Header login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with query cache reset.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for firstâ€‘time users to submit name and phone before accessing the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching the authenticated backend actor and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, identity loading, and state management. Includes helpers for creating an AuthClient and accessing identity status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, admin status, packages, subscriber imports, deletions, and monthly billing via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS layers and defines light/dark theme variables, global styles, and RTL adjustments.
frontend/src/lib/money.ts: Utility functions for formatting amounts as USD and converting numbers to bigint for backend use.
frontend/src/lib/placeholderPhone.ts: Provides a helper to detect backend-generated placeholder phone numbers.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Functions to validate, sanitize, and format WhatsApp phone numbers, including opening chats via wa.me URLs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, React Query, and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/BillingPage.tsx: UI page for selecting a month and year and displaying subscriber billing data, including loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard page showing date selectors and placeholder billing stats pending backend implementation.
frontend/src/pages/SubscribersPage.tsx: Implements subscriber management UI with bulk import, deletion, and package selection using React and custom hooks. Handles dialogs, form state, and API mutations with success/error toasts.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning parameters from URL hashes. Supports both query and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate. Extends UI tokens with custom OKLCH variables.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, versions, features, and pending feature requests for subscriber billing functionality. Defines current state and requirements for upcoming work.
